misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko, a seasoned competitor from Lakeside Golf Vammala, brings a wealth of experience to the Hector Trophée. Known for his strategic play and calm demeanor under pressure, Mikko has been a consistent presence at the tournament.

With ten past appearances, Mikko is still searching for his first Hector Trophée victory. While the team title has eluded him thus far, he remains a formidable opponent in both the individual and pairs formats. Never one to shy away from a challenge, Mikko approaches each tournament with renewed determination and a focus on continuous improvement.

Off the course, Mikko is known for his unique life choices, most notably having planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades. Mikko is expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, marking his eleventh appearance in the prestigious tournament.
